results.title: Simvastatin in the treatment of hypercholesterolaemia in patients with essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ effectively lowered total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ and improved the lipoprotein profile.

results.title: [Drug interaction in 63-year-old male sportsman--a case report].
results.text_hl: Because of interaction between @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, in combination with physical activity, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ reported: @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@muscle pain@@@, @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness of the muscles@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Dizziness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@, and confusion.
